meanings.definition: A picture or design made up of many small photographs.
meanings.sent1: The photomosaics displayed at the art gallery were truly impressive.
meanings.sent2: She created a beautiful photomosaic of her family using old photographs.
meanings.sent3: The photomosaics on the wall seemed to come alive and tell stories.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a photomosaic of memories, each one a piece of the whole.
meanings.sent5: The photomosaic of the city skyline captured every detail perfectly.

meanings.definition: The technique of creating such a picture or design.
meanings.sent1: Learning about photomosaics helped her improve her photography skills.
meanings.sent2: The artist used advanced software to create stunning photomosaics.
meanings.sent3: His photomosaic technique was so unique that it left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent4: The photomosaic method was like putting together a puzzle of memories.
meanings.sent5: The workshop taught participants how to master the art of photomosaics.
